dmca.title: Blog Posts DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

works.description:
We publish calls for Tender on our  
website. This person who created this blog is copying the calls for tender
 
from our website and publishing them. Also taking ourcompany name in to
the  
title of the blog. He threatened to do this through a blackmail threat. He
 
is now doing this. This has been reported to the police. Police report  
number PL2411 2011070827-1. This is the 2nd request I have made to have  
this blog removed. I received no response from the original enquiry. Made 

29th June.

Regards,

Chris Wade.
chris.wade@atc-network.com
Director.
The ATC Network.
